text: ثم لنحن اعلم بالذين هم اولى بها صليا

translations.translation: We know best who deserve to be burnt in (the Fire).
and then We shall know well all those most worthy to be cast in Hell.
We know best who deserves greater suffering in hell fire.
Moreover, We well know those who most deserve to be burned in hell.
Then, verily, We know best those who are most worthy of being burnt therein.
Again We do certainly know best those who deserve most to be burned therein.
then We shall know very well those most deserving to burn there.
And surely We are Best Aware of those most worthy to be burned therein.
We surely know best those most deserving of the fires of hell,
Then surely it is We who are the Best Knower of these worthiest of being therein roasted. *Chapter: 19
Then surely We will know best those who deserve most to enter it.
And certainly We know best those who are most worthy of being burned therein.
Then, verily, We know best those who are most worthy of being burnt therein.
We alone know who deserves most to be burned therein.
We are fully aware of those most deserving to scorch in it.
Then, surely it is We who are most knowing of those most worthy of burning therein.

[19:70] Then indeed We shall know best those most deserving of it, most worthy of [being in] Hell, the most hardened of them and others [like them], for the burning, for the admission [into it] and the scorching [therein], and We shall start with them ([siliyyan is] originally [formed as] salawiyyun, from [the verb] saliya or salaya).
(And surely We are best aware of those most worthy) of those most deserving (to be burned therein) to enter hell.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { ثُمَّ } بعد انتزاعها وانتخابنا { لَنَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ أَوْلَىٰ } وأحق { بِهَا } أي: بدخول النار { صِلِيّاً } [مريم: 70] أي: دخولاً أولياً سابقاً على اكل، وهم الرؤساء الضالون المضلون؛ إذ يضاعف عذابهم لضلالهم وإضلالهم

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: قال تعالى: { ثم لنَحنُ أعلمُ بالذين هم أولى بها صِليًّا } أي: أولى بصليها وأحق بدخولها، وهم المنتزعون الذين هم أشدهم عتوًا، أو رؤوسهم، فإن عذابهم مضاعف لضلالهم وإضلالهم
